mapper.insert: insert into hms_local_event( board_id, period, post_no, basic_address, detail_address) values( #{no}, #{period}, #{postno}, #{basicAddress}, #{detailAddress})
mapper.select:
select m.nickname, l.period, b.title, b.tag, b.created_date from hms_board b inner join hms_local_event l on b.board_id = l.board_id inner join hms_member m on b.member_id = m.member_id
where b.title like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or b.content like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or b.tag like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or m.nickname like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) or l.basic_address like(concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
order by l.period desc

select l.*, m.nickname, b.title, b.content, b.tag, b.created_date from hms_local_event l inner join hms_board b on b.board_id = l.board_id inner join hms_member m on b.member_id = m.member_id where l.board_id=#{no}
